document_data.name: Extension I
document_data.refs1e: {{Cite dragon/49/Leomund's Tiny Hut: A recipe for the Alchemist|59}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Extension I''''' was an [[alteration]] and [[metamagic]] [[spell]] that increased the time another spell lasted.
document_data.Effects: If cast directly after another spell requiring less magical power, ''extension I'' prolonged that spell to one and a half times its original duration.
